dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8090 IH: To reauthorize funding for the Reclamation Climate Change and Water Program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Porter introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize funding for the Reclamation Climate Change and Water Program.

section.header: Reclamation Climate Change and Water Program
section.text: Section 9503(f) of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (42 U.S.C. 10363(f)) is amended by striking 2023 and inserting 2033.
